ApiCount.Description: The number of api web processes to run

ApiMemory.Description: How much memory should be reserved by the api web process

AutoscaleExtra.Description: The number of instances of extra capacity that autoscale should keep running

BuildCpu.Description: How much cpu should be reserved by the builder

BuildInstance.Description: Instance type for a dedicated build cluster

BuildMemory.Description: How much memory should be reserved by the builder

BuildVolumeSize.Description: Default build disk size in GB

ContainerDisk.Description: Default container disk size in GB

EncryptEbs.Description: Enable encryption at rest for EBS volumes

ExistingVpc.Description: Existing VPC ID (if blank a VPC will be created)

HttpProxy.Description: Connect using an outbound HTTP proxy (for network-restricted Racks)

Internal.Description: Support applications that are only accessible inside the VPC

InstanceBootCommand.Description: A single line of shell script to run as CloudInit command early during instance boot.

InstanceRunCommand.Description: A single line of shell script to run as CloudInit command late during instance boot.

InstanceCount.Description: The number of instances in the runtime cluster

InstanceType.Description: The type of the instances in the runtime cluster

InstanceUpdateBatchSize.Description: The number of instances to update in a batch

InstanceSecurityGroup.Description: The security group to assign to the ECS instances.  If blank, convox will create a security group open to all IPs in your VPC

InternetGateway.Description: The InternetGatway to route to if an Existing VPC is specified

Key.Description: SSH key name for access to cluster instances

OnDemandMinCount.Description: The minimum number of on-demand instances in the runtime cluster

PrivateApi.Description: Put Rack API Load Balancer in private network

SwapSize.Description: Default swap volume size in GB

RootSize.Description: Default root disk size in GB
